text: A Special Day () is a 1977 Italian Canadian drama movie directed by Ettore Scola and starring Sophia Loren, John Vernon, Marcello Mastroianni, Vittorio Guerrieri, Alessandra Mussolini. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1978. ==Other websites== * Category:1977 drama movies Category:1977 LGBT movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Italian LGBT movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Canadian LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Ettore Scola
title: A Special Day
